dict.string: A Taste of Saskatchewan
taste-of-sask
Calendar Events Remote Updates Instagram Feed Event Map Offline Browsing
Created in partnership with the committee behind A Taste of Saskatchewan, the app is Saskatoon and area's go-to source for information about the annual event. Development and design done by myself.
Cabinet Reader
cabinet-reader
Private Key Encrypted Documents Strictly Enforced Keychain Credentials AirWatch MDM PSPDFKit

Developed with the help of many over two and a half years, I’ve been a core part of bringing the digital age to the Cabinet of Saskatchewan, accelerating the process of getting thousands of users’ documents to Saskatchewan Ministers.
Trade in Values Canada
trade-in-values
Core Data User Authentication Background Downloading of Updates Account Synchronization with tivs.ca

My first foray into iOS development, the app is starting to show its age. Developed and designed for a side project of mine, tivs.ca displays crowd-sourced video game trade in values from National retailers across Canada.
myViterra
my-viterra
Core Data User Authentication Keychain Storage API Integration Made for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

Developed with a team of four, myViterra allows for farmers to remotely view live updates for commodity prices at nearly a hundred locations throughout North America. Additionally, some design work was done by myself.
The Beermometer
beermometer
Push Notifications Twitter Integration Text Messages Email Notifications Weather Retrieval for User’s Location

Initially created as a school project, The Beermometer spawned from an exploding case of beer left in a snowbank. It uses Newton’s Law of Cooling to alert the user when their beer has reached the desired temperature.
Strokes
strokes
Powered by Parse Online Course List Facebook Sharing Intuitive Interface Shows Four Nearest Courses to User

Created as a solo project, I both designed and developed the application as an elegant score tracker for both golf and mini-golf. Strokes has been optimized for the iPhone 5 screen, and features extensive use of animations.
